    • gameScrean

      public void gameScrean​(Player myPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> wToFind, int maxErrors)
      Displays console game gui
      Parameters:
      myPlayer - Object of player to get information like PlayerName and Stats
      wToFind - Word that is to find in this round
      maxErrors - Maximum number of errors that could be done in this round

    • endGameScrean

      public void endGameScrean​(Player myPlayer, java.lang.String wToFind, int maxErrors, int gameStatus)
      Displays fail/win screan
      Parameters:
      myPlayer - Object of player to get information like PlayerName and Stats
      wToFind - Word that was to find in this round
      maxErrors - Maximum number of errors that could be done in this round
      gameStatus - Info whenever game was won(1) or failed(0)
